talents.desc: Enemies killed by Globe of Annihilation's impact permanently increase its damage by 2 up to a maximum of 500.
talents.name: Taste for Blood

talents.desc: 15% of the damage dealt by All Shall Burn is returned as Health for Azmodan.
talents.name: Gluttony

talents.desc: Reduces the cast and travel time by 40% and deals an additional 12 (+3 per level) damage over 4 seconds.
talents.name: Infernal Globe

talents.desc: Create a pool that empowers Azmodan, his Demons, and allied Minions, increasing their attack and ability damage by 75%. Pools last 5 seconds.
talents.name: Black Pool

talents.desc: Azmodan can move at 75% speed while channeling All Shall Burn.
talents.name: March of Sin

talents.desc: Enemies that attack you have their Attack Speed slowed by 50%.
